verses.verse: And I, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> when I <S%G2064>came<s%> to you, <S%G2064>came<s%> not with <S%G5247>excellency<s%> of <S%G3056>speech<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> <S%G2605>declaring<s%> to you the <S%G3142>testimony<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
For I <S%G2919>determined<s%> not to <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> thing <S%G1722>among<s%> you, <S%G1508>save<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and him <S%G4717>crucified.<s%>
And I was with you in <S%G769>weakness,<s%> and in <S%G5401>fear,<s%> and in <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G5156>trembling.<s%>

And my <S%G3056>speech<s%> and my <S%G2782>preaching<s%> was not with <S%G3981>enticing<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> of <S%G442>man's<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> but in <S%G585>demonstration<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> and of <S%G1411>power:<s%>
That <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> should not <S%G1510>stand<s%> in the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> but in the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

However, we <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> them that are <S%G5046>perfect:<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> not the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G165>world,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> of the <S%G758>princes<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G165>world,<s%> that <S%G2673>come<s%> to <S%G2673>nothing:<s%>

But we <S%G2980>speak<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in a <S%G3466>mystery,<s%> even the <S%G613>hidden<s%> wisdom, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4309>ordained<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G165>world<s%> to our <S%G1391>glory:<s%>

<S%G3739>Which<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of the <S%G758>princes<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G165>world<s%> <S%G1097>knew:<s%> for had they <S%G1097>known<s%> it, they would not have <S%G4717>crucified<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

But as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G3788>Eye<s%> has not <S%G1492>seen,<s%> <S%G2532>nor<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3775>ear<s%> <S%G191>heard,<s%> <S%G2532>neither<s%> <S%G3756><s%> have <S%G305>entered<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> the <S%G2588>heart<s%> of <S%G444>man,<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G2090>prepared<s%> for them that <S%G25>love<s%> him.

But <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G601>revealed<s%> them to us by his <S%G4151>Spirit:<s%> for the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2045>searches<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things, <S%G2532>yes,<s%> the <S%G899>deep<s%> things of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1492>knows<s%> the things of a <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G1508>save<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in him? <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> the things of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1492>knows<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man,<s%> but the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> we have <S%G2983>received,<s%> not the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> but the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is of <S%G2316>God;<s%> that we might <S%G1492>know<s%> the things that are freely <S%G5483>given<s%> to us of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G3739>Which<s%> things <S%G2532>also<s%> we <S%G2980>speak,<s%> not in the <S%G3056>words<s%> which <S%G442>man's<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G1318>teaches,<s%> but which the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G1318>teaches;<s%> <S%G4793>comparing<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> things with <S%G4152>spiritual.<s%>

But the <S%G5591>natural<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1209>receives<s%> not the things of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> for they are <S%G3472>foolishness<s%> to him: <S%G2532>neither<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> he <S%G1097>know<s%> them, <S%G3754>because<s%> they are <S%G4153>spiritually<s%> <S%G350>discerned.<s%>
But he that is <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G350>judges<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things, <S%G1161>yet<s%> he <S%G846>himself<s%> is <S%G350>judged<s%> of <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man.<s%>

For <S%G5101>who<s%> has <S%G1097>known<s%> the <S%G3563>mind<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> that he may <S%G4822>instruct<s%> him? But we <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G3563>mind<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
